title: Crock-Pot Smart Wifi Enabled WeMo 6 Quart Slow Cooker
description:
Adjust cooking time, temperature, shift to warm or turn off using the Free WeMo App from your smart device
Free WeMo App available for Apple(iOS 7 and higher) and Android(4.0 and higher) devices
Connect from anywhere with 3G / 4G / Wi-F
6-quart capacity, cool-touch handles and built-in cord storage
Dishwasher-safe stoneware and glass lid

asset.author: Crock-Pot
asset.description:

Adjust cooking time, temperature, shift to warm or turn off using the Free WeMo App from your smart device
Free WeMo App available for Apple(iOS 7 and higher) and Android(4.0 and higher) devices

transcripts: With the Crock-Pot smart slow cooker enable by Wemo dinner is ready when you’re ready. Now you can adjust meal time from anywhere using your smart device and here's how it works one set up all your connected appliances will appear on your home screen consider this mission control where you can monitor what each of your appliances program to do click on the bar to open the drawer of the programming functions. This is where you can set your temperature and cook time settings, clicking on temperature will open a drop-down menu of temperature options high low or warm make your selection the control panel of the slow cooker will register the temperature change choosing cook timer will expose a time selection wheel where you can scroll to select your desired cook time your final meal ready time will be displayed based on the cooking time that you selected. Click done to save your settings and exit the main menu of the app if you ever want to modify your cook time or temperature open the slow cooker drawer from the main menu and you'll be prompted to modify your settings here you can follow the same process for changing the temperature or cook time and your slow cooker will update to the desired schedule you set more convenience, more control, more connected.
